Name: Public Record Office Victoria, Ballarat Archives Centre

About.Hours & facilities: Mon and Tues 9:30am-4:30pm. General reference assistance available to search room visitors, with some limitation on enquiries by mail or phone. Copying services available for original records to A3, microfilms, photographs, maps and plans. PROVâ€™s online catalogue provides access to the holdings and includes the facility to order records to be retrieved for viewing in the Reading Room as well as providing online access to digital records.
